description: This table holds additional line-level information about the invoice (INV) specific to a given invoice including any line-level overrides.

columns.name: INVOICE_ID
columns.description: The invoice record ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number.

columns.name: INVOICE_NUM
columns.description: The invoice number related to this claim line.

columns.name: CLM_LN
columns.description: The invoice claim line number.

columns.name: PROC_OR_REV_CODE
columns.description: This is the procedure revenue code

columns.name: REV_CODE_DESCRIPT
columns.description: This is the revenue code description

columns.name: POS_CODE
columns.description: The place of service type for this claim line

columns.name: CLAIM_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The claim line status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Open


Closed


Voided


Removed

columns.name: CLAIM_PAID_AMT
columns.description: The claim line paid amount.

columns.name: UB_CPT_CODE
columns.description: This is the Common Procedure Terminology (CPT) code for this institutional claim line.

columns.name: EOB_ALLOWED_AMOUNT
columns.description: The service line's explanation of benefits adjustment amount.

columns.name: EOB_ADJUSTMENT_AMT
columns.description: The service line's explanation of benefits allowed amount.

columns.name: EOB_NON_COVRD_AMT
columns.description: The service line's explanation of benefits non-covered amount.

columns.name: EOB_COINSURANCE
columns.description: The service line's explanation of benefits coinsurance amount.

columns.name: EOB_DEDUCTIBLE
columns.description: The service line's explanation of benefits deductible.

columns.name: EOB_ICN
columns.description: The explanation of benefits internal control number for the claim line.

columns.name: EOB_INV_LVL_YN
columns.description:
Identifies if this explanation of benefits is for the invoice level.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: EOB_COPAY
columns.description: The service line's explanation of benefits copay amount.

columns.name: EOB_COB
columns.description: The explanation of benefits coordination of benefits amount.

columns.name: CLAIM_DENIED_CODE
columns.description: Claim denied code for this claim line on this invoice.

columns.name: REMIT_CODE_ID
columns.description: Remittance code for this claim line on this invoice.

columns.name: TEXT_MESSAGE
columns.description: Message associated with the remittance code for this line on this invoice.

columns.name: TRANSACTION_LIST
columns.description: The charges associated with the invoice. May hold a comma delimited list of professional transactions if the charges were bundled.

columns.name: FROM_SVC_DATE
columns.description: The date when the service was first performed.

columns.name: TO_SVC_DATE
columns.description: The date when the service was last performed.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure associated with the invoice.

columns.name: MODIFIER_ONE
columns.description: The first modifier associated with the invoice. This is the external modifier, as it was printed on the claim.

columns.name: MODIFIER_TWO
columns.description: The second modifier associated with the invoice. This is the external modifier, as it was printed on the claim.

columns.name: MODIFIER_THREE
columns.description: The third modifier associated with the invoice. This is the external modifier, as it was printed on the claim.

columns.name: MODIFIER_FOUR
columns.description: The fourth modifier associated with the invoice. This is the external modifier, as it was printed on the claim.

columns.name: QUANTITY
columns.description: The number of units associated with the invoice.

columns.name: CHARGE_AMOUNT
columns.description: The charge amount associated with the claim line.

columns.name: NONCVD_AMOUNT
columns.description: The non-covered amount associated with the invoice.

columns.name: TYPE_OF_SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of service category value for the claim.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Medical Care


Surgery


Consultation


Diagnostic Radiology


Diagnostic Laboratory


Therapeutic Radiology


Anesthesia


Assistant at Surgery


Other Medical Items or Services


Whole Blood


Used Durable Medical Equipment (DME)


Ambulatory Surgical Center (Facility usage for Surgical Services)


Hospice (Obsolete, Discontinued 1/95)


ESRD Supplies


Monthly Capitation Payment for Dialysis


Kidney Donor


Pneumococcal/Flu Vaccine


Second Opinion on Elective Surgery (Obsolete)


Third Opinion on Elective Surgery (Obsolete)


Diagnostic Medical (Obsolete)


Ancillaries, Hospital and Nursing Home (Obsolete)


Drug Services (Obsolete)


Accommodations, Hospital and Nursing Home (Obsolete)


Dental (Obsolete)


Vision Care and Cataract Lens (Obsolete)


Nuclear Medicine (Obsolete)


Diagnostic X-Ray (Professional) (Obsolete)


Rental of DME


Radiation Therapy (Professional) (Obsolete)


Diagnostic Lab (Professional) (Obsolete)


Diagnostic Medical (Professional) (Obsolete)


DME Purchase (Obsolete)


CRD Equipment (Obsolete)


Pre-Admission Testing (Obsolete)


EPSDT


High Risk Screening Mammography


Low Risk Screening Mammography


Ambulance


Enteral/Parenteral Nutrients/Supplies


Immunosuppressive Drugs


Diabetic Shoes


Hearing Items and Services


Lump Sum Purchase of DME, Prostethics, Orthotics


Vision Items or Services


Surgical Dressings or Other Medical Supplies


Psychological Therapy


Occupational Therapy


Physical Therapy


Medication (Obsolete)


Chiropractic Care


DME Prescription

columns.name: DIAGNOSIS_MAP
columns.description: Holds a comma-delimited list of pointers to the claim level diagnosis. The first number listed represents the primary diagnosis for the charge.

columns.name: SPECIAL_GRP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The claim grouping type category value for the associated claim grouping rule. Only populated if a claim grouping rule was applied to the invoice.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Inpatient Charge Transfer


Radiation Therapy by Procedure Treatment Level


Panel Bundling


Global Billing Setup


FQHC Bundling


Medi-Cal Rural Health Bundling


FQHC Billing


FPEP Bundling


Bilateral Bundling


Bundle Tax With Original Charges


Bundle Tax Charges Only


PQRI Bundle Zero Dollar


Claim Complete


Professional Claim Line Bundling


Global Payment Setup


Professional and Technical Component Bundling

columns.name: GROUP_TX_LIST
columns.description: This holds a list of transaction IDs for bundled charges.

columns.name: UB_MIN_SVC_DATE
columns.description: The earliest date any charges were performed for an institutional claim.

columns.name: UB_MAX_SVC_DATE
columns.description: The latest date any charges were performed for an institutional claim.

columns.name: OT_REIMB_AMT
columns.description: Stores reimbursement amount.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: Stores reimbursement contract.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID_CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.

columns.name: CALC_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reimbursement contract method.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Charge Entry Line Calculation


Invoice Line Calculation


Invoice Bundle Calculation


APC

columns.name: PROC_CODE_RATE
columns.description: Procedure code rate.

columns.name: PROC_CODE_RATE_DESC
columns.description: The procedure code rate.

columns.name: REMITTANCE_RMC1_ID
columns.description: First remittance code ID.

columns.name: REMITTANCE_RMC1_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: REMITTANCE_RMC2_ID
columns.description: Second remittance code ID.

columns.name: REMITTANCE_RMC2_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: REMITTANCE_RMC3_ID
columns.description: Third remittance code ID.

columns.name: REMITTANCE_RMC3_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: REMITTANCE_RMC4_ID
columns.description: Fourth remittance code ID.

columns.name: REMITTANCE_RMC4_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: CLM_LN_CREAT_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date the claim line is created.

columns.name: INV_NUM_GRP100LN
columns.description: The invoice line number.

columns.name: CLM_LN_PAID_DATE
columns.description: Stores the most recent date the invoice line is paid.

columns.name: IS_CODE_ONLY
columns.description: Identifies show only lines.

columns.name: LN_AUTH_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the line level authorization number.

columns.name: LN_REF_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the line level referral number.

columns.name: FQHC_BILLOUT_MOD_ID
columns.description: The modifier added to a bill out line for grouped claim lines.

columns.name: FQHC_BILLOUT_MOD_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.
